_header: All blithe might they be / that follies blithely will flee
Title(s): Disputisoun by-twene a cristenmon and a Iew
_description: ‘A Disputisoun by-twene a Cristenmon and a Iew’ — twelve-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Alle Blithe mote þei beÞat folyes bleþeliche wole
                    fle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þus to vre God he hym kneuȝAnd ȝeply him
                    ȝolde
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
A Disputisoun by twene a cristene mon And A Iew (f.
                    301vc)
